subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sergei Fedorov drew on all his experience when he broke into the Rangers’ zone, one-on-one against defenseman Wade Redden, with five minutes left in a deadlocked Game 7.
snippet: Sergei Fedorov drew on all his experience when he broke into the Rangers’ zone, one-on-one against defenseman Wade Redden, with five minutes left in a deadlocked Game 7.
